description.narrative: (Bangladesh): This activity will increase agricultural productivity, incomes, and private sector investment in food and non-food value chains. It will provide training and demonstration interventions to promote the use of quality inputs and improved agricultural management systems. It will facilitate market by connecting small producers with aggregators, institutional buyers, and processors. For example, it will support financial institutions in developing new agriculture loan products, provide financial literacy training, pilot weather index-based insurance schemes, establish technology-based production traceability systems, develop packaging and transportation services, promote new seed varieties, connect farmers and local entrepreneurs to organized markets, and assist small and medium entrepreneurs to design, develop, and produce new natural fiber based products for the domestic and international markets.
